name: Balsamic Chicken Tomato Salad
description: This Balsamic Chicken Tomato Salad is a perfect choice for anyone looking for a healthy, low-carb, and low-sugar meal option. Its fresh ingredients and light dressing make it an ideal recipe for those who are health-conscious but still crave delicious flavors.

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken breast with salt and white pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the chicken breast over medium heat until fully cooked, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Ice Berg Lettuce under cold water and chop it.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the tomato for about 5 minutes, then allow to cool before chopping.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the grilled chicken, chopped lettuce, and tomato.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and toss to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the All-Bran Regular on top of the salad for an added crunch.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
